name: NIST 800-53
description: NIST Special Publication 800-53 provides a catalog of security and privacy controls for federal information systems and organizations.

controls.title: Access Control Policy and Procedures
controls.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates an access control policy.
controls.remediation: Implement a comprehensive access control policy with regular reviews.

name: CIS Controls
description: The CIS Controls are a prioritized set of actions to protect organizations and data from cyber attacks.

controls.title: Inventory and Control of Hardware Assets
controls.description: Actively manage all hardware devices on the network.
controls.remediation: Maintain an accurate inventory of all hardware assets connected to the network.

name: PCI DSS
description: The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is a security standard for organizations that handle credit card data.

controls.title: Install and maintain a firewall
controls.description: Install and maintain a firewall configuration to protect cardholder data.
controls.remediation: Implement firewalls between all wireless networks and the cardholder data environment.

controls.name: Secure User Authentication
controls.description: Implement strong authentication mechanisms for all HPC system users
controls.remediation: Configure LDAP/Active Directory integration with MFA support

controls.name: Network Segmentation
controls.description: Implement proper network segmentation for HPC clusters
requirements: Separate compute nodes from management network
Implement VLANs for different node types
controls.remediation: Configure network switches and firewalls according to security zones

controls.name: Job Scheduling Security
controls.description: Implement secure job scheduling and resource allocation
requirements: Implement job priority and fair share policies
Monitor and log job scheduling activities
controls.remediation: Configure SLURM/PBS with security policies and monitoring

controls.name: Data Encryption
controls.description: Implement encryption for sensitive data at rest and in transit
requirements: Encrypt data at rest using strong encryption
Use TLS for data in transit
controls.remediation: Configure LUKS for disk encryption and TLS for network traffic

controls.name: System Monitoring
controls.description: Implement comprehensive system monitoring and logging
requirements: Log security events and system changes
controls.remediation: Deploy monitoring tools like Prometheus and ELK stack
